title: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
description: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in TH, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not have any effect. The expected behavior is that selecting this option should add Javadoc to the specified field. However, currently nothing happens when the option is selected. It is suggested that either this menu option should be removed or, preferably, the action should be implemented to add Javadoc to the field.
OB: When I select the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu for a field in TH, nothing happens.
EB: When I select the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu for a field in TH, the Javadoc should be added to the field.
SR:
1. Open the TH component.
2. Right-click on a field.
3. From the context menu, select the 'Add Javadoc' option.
4. Now observe that nothing happens.
